response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I estimate its true value to be over $1,200,000. However, to make this opportunity more accessible, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This is a special offer tailored for individuals like yourself who appreciate exceptional value and innovation. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a viewing of the product.", "product_price": 950000}
